about_the_game:
Short TPS game.
The game is a free add-on to Super Hiking Simulator 2020.

How to play
You can select this game when you push "PLAY" on STEAM app.

About game
Rin was taken back to the religious compound in a campaign to recapture her.
Please operate Aya to escort Rin to the exit.

Success condition
Rin reaches the exit.

Failure condition
Death of Aya.
Death of Rin.

Notes
Rin can use recovery magic on Aya. But MP is limited.
Rin regularly casts a shield spell on herself. If you take time, MP becomes zero.
Rin can lose sight of Aya.
You need to guide Rin to the destination.
Enemies prioritize attacks on Rin.

Method of operation
W, A, S, D: Move
Spacebar: jump
Dash: Shift key
R: Reload
Right Click: Aim target
Left click: Shoot
ESC: Pause screen
Crouch: Left control key

content_descriptors.notes:
The main character shoots people or things with a gun.
(There's no bloodshed, no Gore, no grotesque scenes.)

name: Super Hiking Simulator 2020 - Escort Rin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octa-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 903 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (7th) or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 903 MB available space

short_description: Short TPS game. The game is a free add-on to Super Hiking Simulator 2020.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, French, German
